effect.ruby_sapphire: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random. hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal. Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible. If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.
effect.emerald: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random. hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal. Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible. If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.
effect.firered_leafgreen: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random. hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal. Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible. If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.
effect.colosseum: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random. hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal. Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible. If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.
effect.xd: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random. hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal. Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible. If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.
short_effect.emerald: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.
short_effect.firered_leafgreen: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.
short_effect.colosseum: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.
short_effect.xd: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Changes the user’s type into an own move’s type.
flavor_text.emerald: Changes the user’s type into a known move’s type.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user changes its type to match the type of one of its moves.
